body.p: I am trying to keep up with you in the letter department but it is keeping me busy.

Pardon my manners, but I trust you are in good health. I am simply fading away to skin + bones. You know how it is. Your last letter the most interesting + well written that I have had the pleasure of reading. Keep up the good work.
Well a short recap of my last three days. Monday we drove seventy miles to Carp for a short job. We finished on time for once and got back here about seven o’clock.
Tuesday we finally got started on the job. At noon the boys decided to move into another part. When we got there

We didn’t get started back to work until quarter to three. Tuesday night Jerry + I went out fishing again. This time we were after trout. But somebody had already beaten us to the stream. So we tried another. I caught one rainbow trout (that’s what Jerry called it).

Today we went back to where we left off yesterday. We worked all morning. We finished during noon hour. Believe it or not I caught two bass. So far I have not kept any of the fish, I don’t know what I would do with them.
Guess what I went to the show tonight I figured it might do me some good seeing it was religious. It was David + Goliath. It was fair, it stuck strictly to the Bible, as it should.

I am glad we have such opinions of ourselves. Both discussing a weekend away from home and saying its not the way you think, it will be respectable. To tell you the truth I think both of them would be fun. If I could only get close to home for a while I would be able to do my share on the Go-Karts track. And then I would be able to alternate weekends with Pete.

Sometimes I get browned off with this job. I like the work if you can call it that but right now I am living one out of every three weeks and that is the one I am home. All my social life family life an you are at home. That is why this job bothers me.
Well dear that is enough of my troubles as usual everybody else is in bed. So will close
P.S. Continue your strength for over
for next weekend. Because I looking forward till then. And please keep the lid on the box.
p.s.s. It’s OK if you go out with Duck.
